Gaithersburg.North Potomac, Maryland:
North Potomac is a census-designated place and an unincorporated area in Montgomery County, Maryland, United States.


== History ==
North Potomac was created in 1988 from the peripheral fringes of Gaithersburg and Rockville, and lies parallel to the Potomac River. North Potomac shares ZIP codes with Gaithersburg and Rockville.
